title: Ep. 759 The Real Reason Behind the Democrat Meltdown
description:
Summary:
In this episode I address the meltdown in the Democrat Party over the selection of Brett Kavanaugh for the Supreme Court. I also address the continued underestimation of Donald Trump by D.C. swamp rats.
 
News Picks:
Texas tops the list for pro-business states. 
 
Brett Kavanaugh and Metadata.
 
These six senators are critical to the confirmation of Kavanaugh.
 
More Democrat hypocrisy regarding the Supreme Court.
 
Tucker Carlson dismantles this liberal professor in a debate about socialism.
 
A solid article about inflation.
 
Democrats are scrambling to save unions. 
 
Copyright CRTV. All rights reserved.
